profile.title: Profile
profile.description:
Born to a conservatory director father and an entrepreneurial mother with a taekwondo association, I learned the discipline of work and life early on.
By assisting with the renovation and maintenance of the family château from a young age, I developed a keen sense of responsibility and teamwork.
At seven, my father gifted me my first computer, sparking my curiosity for technology. By nine, I had built my first tower, marking my entry into the world of hardware.
However, it was with the acquisition of my first Arduino board at twelve that my passion for software and automation truly emerged.
I then learned solid programming basics through the "Siteduzero" (now OpenClassroom) site, and started creating JAVA mods for Minecraft.

After obtaining my baccalaureate in 2016 in engineering sciences with a specialty in computer science and digital sciences, I pursued my studies in mathematics and computer science at the University of Aix-en-Provence.
However, eager to quickly join the professional world, I opted for a JAVA J2E Expert training, which I funded by working at the Aubagne theater.
There, I gained practical skills in stage assembly and dressing room management, ensuring the well-being of artists and the smooth running of productions.

My entry into the professional world was marked by a collaboration with a friend launching his brand, where I created and managed their online sales site, set up complex setups for streamers, and optimized connections in a dedicated villa.
Encouraged to become a freelancer, I then diversified my services, completing projects ranging from simple landing pages to complex booking applications, as well as automation solutions for businesses.

Despite my technical skills and achievements, I have always found it difficult to sell my services due to my reserved nature.
Passionate about AI and emerging technologies, I am now looking for opportunities that will allow me to leverage and expand my programming skills while collaborating with teams that share my vision and enthusiasm for technological innovation.

freelance.title: Freelance Developer
description: Development of several websites, ranging from showcase sites to e-commerce sites.
Creation of two simple mobile applications for event booking management.
Implementation of a marketing action with an answering machine and SMS link sending for creating temporary profiles.
Development of two app concepts for start-ups, using React, firebase or SQL and Python.

infiniteAgency.title: Infinite Agency, Marseille — Web Technical Manager
infiniteAgency.description: Creation and maintenance of the company's website, technical management of projects related to influencers and clothing sales, assembly and configuration of professional PCs for streamers.

aubagne.title: Before my 20s - 2 years at the Aubagne town hall
aubagne.description: Hall keeper - Black Penitent of Aubagne then Comoedia Theater as a temporary worker (Reception, secretarial work, then dressing room manager)

distinctions.title: Distinctions
distinctions.music: Music: 10 years of piano lessons, practice of guitar.
distinctions.technology: Technologies and video games: Passionate about computers, video games, and artificial intelligence. I would like to create my own video game one day.
distinctions.media: Media: Regular consumer of YouTube content, both educational and/or entertaining.
distinctions.veille: Tech watch: I like to spend my time staying informed about IT news and applying/participating in the development of promising open-source projects.
distinctions.events: Events: I also take care of the courtesy of events and the work of my father's castle.

project1.title: Project 1: Lumiscool in progress
project1.description: This project is an ambitious platform for booking activities...

project2.title: Project 2: Chateau de Vins sur Caramy
project2.description: The website for my father's castle, which I need to redo.

project4.title: Project 4: Amazon Scraper
project4.description: Scrape Amazon to sort results by price, rating, and number of reviews...

project5.title: Project 5: Dalhae Academy
project5.description: The website for my mother's taekwondo club...
